official_title: Joint resolution to provide for a study of the effects of saccharin.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to conduct a study of the effects of saccharin within one year of the enactment of this resolution. Directs the Secretary to submit a report on the findings of such study to the President and Congress. Prohibits the banning of saccharin until such report has been submitted to the President and Congress.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for a study of the effects of saccharin.
